entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 30. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 then light near midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
